definition: to put something in a place where people can see it easily; to show something to people
to show a quality, feeling, skill or type of behaviour; to show signs of something
to show information

talk or reports about the very bad or wrong things that people have done or are thought to have done

liking to talk a lot

in addition to what has just been stated. Furthermore is used especially to add a point to an argument.

people in general

connected with the meaning of words and sentences

from only a short distance away
near enough to be reached, seen or heard

crazy

used when you are going to disagree, usually quite strongly, with somebody

if two things merge, or if one thing merges into another, the differences between them gradually disappear so that it is impossible to separate them
